item.description:
Molecular signatures associated with the development of pulmonary toxicities in mesothelioma patients treated with radical hemithoracic radiation therapy.

Order of Authors and affiliation:

1. Sergio Crovella

Biological and Environmental Sciences, University of Qatar, Doha, State of Qatar

2. Alberto Revelant

Department of Radiation Oncology, Centro di Riferimento Oncologico di Aviano (CRO) IRCCS, Aviano, Italy

3. Elena Muraro

4. Ronald Rodrigues de Moura

Institute for Maternal and Child Health – IRCCS “Burlo Garofolo”, Trieste, Italy

5. Lucas Brandão

Institute for Maternal and Child Health – IRCCS “Burlo Garofolo”, Trieste, Italy
Federal University of Pernambuco, Laboratory of Molecular Pathology, Pernambuco, Brazil

6. Marco Trovò

7. Agostino Steffan

Department of Life Sciences, University of Trieste, Italy

9. Giuliano Zabucchi
